Hi,
    I was wondering if there is a way view the arc's contents in a 
simple way.. for example to put it in a dvd and view it.
    I was thinking in something to save the arc's contents as directory, 
something like httrack. I think I saw a post about it..
    But there might be better ways..so I'd appreciate some pointers 
about it.

Thanks in advance,
    Jo�o Luzio
